cutinfo.2_0: The player approaches her for a date, but she seems slightly unenthusiastic about it.
cutinfo.3_0: This time she's been really persistent, trying to get the MC to come with her.

items.text: Sitting in an unknown location (TBD), the girl is alone by herself.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Why did it have to end up like this...

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: The girl finally notices you're there.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Oh.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I've seen you around before.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: My name's {name}.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Nice to meet you I guess...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: My name's {lovername}.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: So, did you come here just to laugh at me?

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Where's your boyfriend?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Could you not?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: It's not like it's any of your business!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: ...Sorry... I didn't mean to be rude.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Just a little bit.
"Grumble" effect plays over her head.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: How would you like it if your girlfriend just up and left you for no reason?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: There's no way someone like you would have a girlfriend...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: So how about it? You're mine now.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Uhh...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: You should be happy to get someone like me.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Here's my number.

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: You got {lovername}'s phone number.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Let's hang out soon, ok? I can't wait darling!
She gets up, looks at MC, then starts walking away. Stops before leaving frame.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Hmph. I'll show him.
She finishes leaving frame.

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: ...You're in a relationship, apparently.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Hahahaha

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Shut up!

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Why would I do that?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Yeah, right.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: As if you couldn't tell I was...

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Yes!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Geez, don't get so excited. It's not like we're that close.
Link starts when you approach her, really. Location TBD.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Great! I'm so excited for our first date, darling!
MC takes a step forward, she takes a step backwards.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Yep, I can tell just from looking at you that you're excited too.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I know just the perfect thing for a first date.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: There's a coffee shop not to far from here.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: It's got the perfect romantic atmosphere.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Meh...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Too bad, that's where we're going.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Now get a move on, go!
Fade out and walk into cafe, look around.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Sounds nice.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Of course! I'm the perfect girlfriend after all.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Follow me.

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: The cafe is full of couples sipping their drinks and holding hands.
LoverLink looks around.
Waiter walks forward.

items.speaker: Waiter
items.text: Welcome. Table for two I imagine?
LoverLink looks around again.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Huh? Oh, yes.
Switch camera to them sitting at opposite ends of a table.
Sweatdrop animation above MC's head.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: What? What do you want?

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Having fun?

items.speaker: MC
items.text: I just love spending time with you like this darling.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Was this a bad time for a date?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Yeah this is great.
Grumble sprite over her head as she chugs her coffee.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Look at us, the perfect happy couple.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: It's so great to spend time with you.
She chugs her coffee again.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Well, I'm done, so I'm leaving.
She gets up.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Enjoy the rest of your coffee, darling.
Screen fades, then back in as you sit alone. Sweatdrop sprite.
MC chugs his coffee.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Oh look at that you're done.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Guess it's time to go then darling!
She gets up.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Yeah, me too!
She looks to the side (trying to convey to the player that she says this under her breath).

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Ugh...
She looks back up.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: So how's your coffee darling?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Delicious, isn't it?

items.speaker: MC
items.text: It's great!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I'm so glad you like it!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: No, of course not.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Look at all these other people here doing the same.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: And out of everyone here, we're the happiest, right?
She takes a sip of her coffee.
Starting location TBD.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Finally!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: This time we're going to the mall.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: There's a great sale today so don't you dare complain again.
She starts walking off, but stops before leaving frame.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: What are you waiting for, hurry up!
She walks off frame.
Distress sripte on MC, and he runs after her.
Camera change to the mall area. LoverLink and MC walk in. There's a few people, but two in particular near a store exit.
She stops and looks around.
Exclamation sprite when she sees them.
We walks over to "near" them (basically within earshot).

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Thank you so much for going shopping with me darling!
She gets up really close to MC.

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: I just love spending this time with you darling!
Question mark sprite appears over guy's head.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Are you OK?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I'm feeling great darling.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Is there anything you want to do after this darling?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: We could go to the cafe, watch a movie.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I know how much you wanted to see that new release.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: What was is again?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Revengers: Last Level?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Or we could take it easy and, you know...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Head back to my place and relax?
Interrobang and distress sprites on MC.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: What are you doing?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I just want to make sure you're happy, darling.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: You do so much for me, I've got to make sure you're happy too.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: We're just the perfect couple after all.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Look at us, all lovey-dovey in public like this.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: I love the Revengers!

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Can we go right away?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Of course you do!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I know you so well darling, and I want to make you happy!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Hahaha, you're too silly!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: We haven't even gone shopping yet!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I know you we're joking though.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: We can practically read each others' minds now.
Guy shakes his head.

items.speaker: Girl
items.text: Do you know them?

items.speaker: Boy
items.text: Uh... Let's ignore them.
Anger sprite on LoverLink.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Hey, since we're sooo in love with each other...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: We should hold hands as we walk around!

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Stick out your hand.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Isn't it a little early for that?
LoverLink moves immediately adjacent to MC.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Oh, your hand is so warm....

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: And I can almost feel your heart beating when we're close like this...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I love you so much darling.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I wish we could stay like this forever...
Sweat drop on girl.

items.speaker: Girl
items.text: Geez, what are they doing?
Anger sprite on LoverLink x2 in a row for extra anger.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I know we haven't been together for that long darling.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: But we both know how perfect we are together.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: So there's no need to hold back. It's OK to skip a few steps in this situation.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Oh and I've got a special surprise for you...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: There's something special on sale today too...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: So...
LoverLink looks at other couple then back at MC.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: You'll get to help me pick out a swimsuit, OK?
Exclamation mark on everyone but LoverLink.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: You'll get to see me in all different kinds you know.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I hope we find one you like!

items.speaker: Boy
items.text: Hey... Maybe we should go.

items.speaker: Girl
items.text: Yeah, there's no reason to stick around here.
Guy and Girl walk off frame.

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: Hah.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Alright, there's nothing to do here anymore.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: What about the swimsuit?
LoverLink lets go and walks a few steps in the direction they left.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Do you want to talk?

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Do you know them?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Huh?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: No, not at all.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Well, enjoy the rest of your day or whatever.

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: You think you might be starting to understand what's going on a little better.
Rank up, then MC walks away.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: What do you mean? We've been talking all this time.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I can't spent every second with you, geez.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Don't be so needy.
LoverLink walks off.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Geez, you really want to see me in a swimsuit so badly?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Just go look up pictures on the internet or whatever, perv.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Yeah, I sure can't wait to do all this shopping!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I know right!? Shopping together is the best!
Starting location is on the way out of school grounds, but no one else in frame.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Hmm, I don't think they're-

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: -I mean we're going anywhere today.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I guess that's just means I can take it easy for once and relax.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: And what should I do?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: How should I know, I'm not your mom.

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: Entertain yourself. I'm not responsible for you.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Should we go to the coffee shop again then?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Ugh, I don't think I can handle that place anymore.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Even if their cakes are really cute...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Anyway, almost all the seats are in pairs in that place, so I don't want to go alone. It would be awkward sitting next to a stranger.
Sweatdrop on MC...
Generic speak animation plays for MC, then loverlink. Implies general chatter.
Exclamation mark over loverlink's head as she looks sideways, then back.
Guy walks into frame, heading for the exit.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Darliiiing...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Let's walk home together!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: We can stop at the arcade on the way too!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Do you know that fighting game, Alleyway Brawler 4 Ultra?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I'm reeeaally good at it.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Let's play together!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: And if you win... I'll give you a kiss!
Sweatdrop on MC and Guy.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Hee hee, you should consider yourself lucky!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Most girls aren't into these kinds of things.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: But being with me means you get to enjoy all kinds of things like this.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Just like you said, you're sooooo lucky to have me as your girlfriend!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Doing all these activities and spending time together...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: You'd have to be crazy to give this up, right?
Anger sprite on Guy.
Guy walks up to loverlink, almost pushing MC out of the way. Almost but not actually, MC's model does not move.

items.speaker: Boy
items.text: Would you stop it already?

items.speaker: Boy
items.text: I already told you how I felt.

items.speaker: Boy
items.text: We're not getting back together, ok!
Distress sprite on loverlink.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: It's not like that you prick!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: What, can you not stand the thought of me enjoying the company of someone else?
Angry animation on guy.

items.speaker: Boy
items.text: Don't give me that bullshit!

items.speaker: Boy
items.text: You've been following us around for... who knows how long!
Guys turns to MC.

items.speaker: Boy
items.text: I'm sorry man.

items.speaker: Boy
items.text: Look, if you're serious about your relationship with her, please try and do something about this.

items.speaker: Boy
items.text: I just can't anymore.
Guy walks off....

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: {loverlink} looks like she's on the verge of tears.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Wow, what a prick.

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Guess I should "do something about this" then...

items.speaker: MC
items.text: Do you want to talk about it?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Yeah, and wha-...?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Wait, so... You're serious...?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: .....Talk about what?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: I have no idea what that guy was talking about.
Sweatdrop on MC.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Oh alright, fine.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Let's talk about it some other time. I just want to go home now.
Loverlink turns away.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: See ya.
Loverlink walks off.

items.speaker: Narrator
items.text: You're starting to get a better idea of {loverlink}'s circumstances...
Rankup and end.

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: What do you know?

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: He was... He Just...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Sorry...

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: Wait, no, I mean...!

items.speaker: LoversLink
items.text: ...sigh...

info:
I have an idea about someone approaching the MC as "revenge" for someone else dumping them. The whole original aspect of the arcana pertaining to "crossroads" I feel may also pertain to parting ways as oppose to coming together, and knowing when roads must part again. The reverse actually being that the MC and this person stay together, just to spite the other person (who has already made their peace, and probably did nothing wrong per say).

I think that in order for the "random" approaching the MC to make somewhat sense, this is a character that would have to have appeared in the past. It could be another social link which, as a side element, invloves a breakup. It could be a social link that's unlocked by repeatedly talking to certain NPCs while wandering around the maps. The characters would have to speak to each other at some point, one way or another.
